summary: TAKATA RECALL, LOUD HUMMING/ VIBRATION NOISE APPEARS TO BE COMING FROM UNDERNEATH REAR OF VEHICLE. FIRST STARTED WHILE DRIVING ON THE STREET, PULLED OVER TO CHECK AND IT WAS WHEN THE ENGINE WOULD NOT TURN BACK ON, ENGINE LIGHT TURNED ON, AFTER THIS THE KEY FOB PUSH TO START HAS NOT BEEN WORKING AND EVERY TIME YOU PUMP GAS THE ENGINE HAS PROBLEMS TURNING ON, ONLY TURNS ON AFTER PRESSING THE GAS.
